name: com.ireshsampath.unity-assets.osc-handler
description: This asset provides a comprehensive solution for handling Open Sound Control (OSC) messages in Unity, built on top of extOSC. It supports sending and receiving OSC messages efficiently, making it ideal for real-time applications, interactive installations, and networked multimedia projects.

samples.description: An example scene demonstrating OSC message handling in Unity using extOSC.
